thread.title: Who says shovelling can't be romantic? Snow storm Valentine's Day greetings
thread.title_full: Who says shovelling can't be romantic? Snow storm Valentine's Day greetings

author: cbc
title: Who says shovelling can't be romantic? Snow storm Valentine's Day greetings
text:
Romantic gestures have a different meaning in Newfoundland and Labrador when there's a snow storm on the way.
Plowing your beloved's driveway, salting their stairs and sharing a bag of all-dressed storm chips are just some of the ways you can show someone you care this Valentine's Day storm.
Valentine's Day winter storm headed for Newfoundland Maybe skip the flowers and go for a bag of salt this year.
